body: Have you heard Didier Awadi's tributes to Pan-African African leaders and revolutionaries.  The Senegalese DJ, Didier Awadi ,is one of the most highly respected African musicians.
original_body: Have you heard Didier Awadi's tributes to Pan-African African leaders and revolutionaries. The Senegalese DJ, Didier Awadi ,is one of the most highly respected African musicians.
title: Africa: Tributes to Pan-African leaders and revolutionaries
